00021 static const int LIBMECAB_ID = 77718;
00022 
00023 MeCab::Mutex *getGlobalMutex() {
00024   static MeCab::Mutex m;
00025   return &m;
00026 }
00027 
00028 std::string *getStaticErrorString() {
00029   static std::string errorStr;
00030   return &errorStr;
00031 }
00032 
00033 const char *getGlobalError() {
00034   return getStaticErrorString()->c_str();
00035 }
00036 
00037 void setGlobalError(const char *str) {
00038   MeCab::Mutex *m = getGlobalMutex();
00039   m->lock();
00040   std::string *error = getStaticErrorString();
00041   *error = str;
00042   m->unlock();
00043 }
00044 
00045 struct mecab_t {
00046   int allocated;
00047   MeCab::Tagger* ptr;
00048 };
00049 
00050 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00051 HINSTANCE DllInstance = 0;
00052 
00053 #ifdef __cplusplus
00054 extern "C" {
00055 #endif
00056   BOOL WINAPI DllMain(HINSTANCE hinst, DWORD dwReason, LPVOID) {
00057     if (!DllInstance) {
00058       DllInstance = hinst;
00059     }
00060     std::locale loc(std::locale("japanese"),
00061                     "C", std::locale::numeric);
00062     std::locale::global(loc);
00063     return TRUE;
00064   }
00065 #ifdef __cplusplus
00066 }
00067 #endif
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 mecab_t* mecab_new(int argc, char **argv) {
00071   mecab_t *c = new mecab_t;
00072   MeCab::Tagger *ptr = MeCab::createTagger(argc, argv);
00073   if (!c || !ptr) {
00074     delete c;
00075     delete ptr;
00076     setGlobalError(MeCab::getTaggerError());
00077     return 0;
00078   }
00079   c->ptr = ptr;
00080   c->allocated = LIBMECAB_ID;
00081   return c;
00082 }
00083 
00084 mecab_t* mecab_new2(const char *arg) {
00085   mecab_t *c = new mecab_t;
00086   MeCab::Tagger *ptr = MeCab::createTagger(arg);
00087   if (!c || !ptr) {
00088     delete c;
00089     delete ptr;
00090     setGlobalError(MeCab::getTaggerError());
00091     return 0;
00092   }
00093   c->ptr = ptr;
00094   c->allocated = LIBMECAB_ID;
00095   return c;
00096 }

00098 const char *mecab_version() {
00099   return MeCab::Tagger::version();
00100 }
00101 
00102 const char* mecab_strerror(mecab_t *c) {
00103   if (!c || !c->allocated)
00104     return const_cast<char *>(getGlobalError());
00105   return c->ptr->what();
00106 }
00107 
00108 void mecab_destroy(mecab_t *c) {
00109   if (c && c->allocated) {
00110     delete c->ptr;
00111     delete c;
00112   }
00113   c = 0;
00114 }
00115 
00116 #define MECAB_CHECK_FIRST_ARG(c, t)                     \
00117   if (!(c) || (c)->allocated != LIBMECAB_ID) {          \
00118     setGlobalError("first argment seems invalid");      \
00119     return 0;                                           \
00120   } MeCab::Tagger *(t) = (c)->ptr;
00121 
00122 #define MECAB_CHECK_FIRST_ARG_VOID(c, t)                \
00123   if (!(c) || (c)->allocated != LIBMECAB_ID) {          \
00124     setGlobalError("first argment seems invalid");      \
00125     return;                                             \
00126   } MeCab::Tagger *(t) = (c)->ptr;
